doc:
Fernando Sánchez Polack https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fernando_S%C3%A1nchez_Polack 0 Fernando Sánchez Polack (11 August 1920 – 24 January 1982) was a Spanish actor. He appeared in 113 films and television shows between 1959 and 1982. He starred in the 1966 film La caza, which won the Silver Bear for Best Director at the 16th Berlin International Film Festival. Fernando_Sánchez_Polack ( 11_August_1920 – 24_January_1982 ) was a_Spanish_actor . He appeared in 113_films_and_television_shows between 1959_and_1982 . He starred in the_1966_film La_caza , which won the_Silver Bear_for_Best_Director at the_16th_Berlin_International_Film_Festival .
